channel.title: Free Dedicated Hosting for a Server
channel.description:
[u][b]Filled! [/b][/u]
If you have a good server and can't host it on your computer, or can't afford hosting, I have a dedicated server with a 10mbps connection and it has some space and bandwidth leftover. It hosts a few websites currently. I got a friend to setup a test server, and it worked well. I thought about hosting a WoW server but that would use too much bandwidth.
The server specs are:
Processor: 2x Xeon - 2.4 GHz Ram: 1024MB DDR2 HD: 8 x 300GB - 10K RPM (2.4TB - 1.1TB in use as of 3/4/08.) Bandwidth: 1000GB/m (I use about 600GB a month, I own a file host. That leaves a good 400GB for servers.) Location: Atlanta, GA. Speed: 10Mb/s Uptime: 95% - 98% Lag: Almost non-existent. (During busy hours, it may get a little bogged down. I've heard about some slow speed issues from different countries and across the country.)
Basically, I only want to host 1 server. Possibly 2. If you think you'd be interested, PM me.

item.title: Free Dedicated Hosting for a Server
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

Ibehustlin247’s server is up…and not stolen! gasp

I didn’t even make myself admin or anything.

In reply to Defenz0r, it’s easy, and I have extra bandwidth so I don’t really mind.

(His server is KasparScape on the server status page.)

Read full topic
